components.name: Application Gateway with Azure WAF
components.description: Acts as a web application firewall, providing security and traffic management for incoming requests.

components.name: Azure Firewall
components.description: Provides network security by controlling inbound and outbound traffic within the virtual network.

components.name: Azure AI Foundry
components.description: Platform for deploying AI models and services, processing data for user requests.

components.name: Private Endpoint Subnet
components.description: Contains private endpoints for secure access to Azure services without exposing them to the public internet.

data_flows.description: User requests are sent to the Application Gateway for initial processing and security checks.
Requests are routed to the Azure AI Foundry for data processing and AI model execution.
Processed data is sent to secure Azure services via private endpoints.

trust_boundaries.name: User Access Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between external users and the internal application services.

trust_boundaries.name: Internal Processing Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between application services and data storage services.
